item.title: Error:
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I had this error when trying to add the ::tele command to my RuneJava based server. I get a bunch of stuff that looks like this. I added it under the “bank” command. I think I forgot to add something. Error:

public void rearrangeBank() { //This fills up the empty spots ^ client.java:3925: class, interface, or enum expected int highestSlot = 0; ^ client.java:3926: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { ^ client.java:3926: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { ^ client.java:3926: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { ^ client.java:3929: class, interface, or enum expected if (highestSlot <= i) highestSlot = i; ^ client.java:3930: class, interface, or enum expected } } ^ client.java:3932: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i <= highestSlot; i++) { ^ client.java:3932: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i <= highestSlot; i++) {

What I added and where:

[code] /* Useful Commands - Inside Sin */
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sendMessage(""+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" players are currently online!");
playerMenu();
} else if(command.startsWith(“bank”)) {
openUpBank();
else if(command.startsWith(“tele”) && playerRights >= 2){
{
int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 9));
int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10, 14));
teleportToX = newPosX;
teleportToY = newPosY;
}

       		}
  } else if(command.startsWith("empty")) {
    removeAllItems();[/code]

Its the tele command.

Read full topic
